# Board of Selectmen

PLEASE NOTE:  If you are emailing the Board of Selectmen using the email of boardmembers@wearenh.gov, that email group includes all five Selectmen as well as the Town Administrator.  

Nonpublic session minutes listing by year is located on a separate tab on the left hand column.  The years are from 2009 to present.
